definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Neither officer nor soldier wore any insignia showing either rank or unit.
sentences.chinese: 官兵都不佩戴任何表明軍階或所屬單位的符號。

sentences.english: The head of a business unit shall be responsible for all risk management matters in the unit under management.
sentences.chinese: 業務單位主管總承其所屬單位的全部風險管理事宜。

sentences.english: This method is applicable for all employees of various departments of the company.
sentences.chinese: 本辦法適用於公司所屬單位各員工。

sentences.english: To be responsible for management of land used by Central Government institutions and their affiliated institutions.
sentences.chinese: 負責中央國家機關及所屬單位用地管理工作。

sentences.english: Most of these individuals came to the effort with the full support and assistance of the institutions with which they were affiliated.
sentences.chinese: 他們中多數人還得到所屬單位的大力支持和幫助。
